selectedVerses.text: But we had hoped that he was the one to redeem Israel. Yes, and besides all this, it is now the third day since these things happened.
Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
If in this life only we have hoped in Christ, we are of all people most to be pitied.

And the inhabitants of this coastland will say in that day, 'Behold, this is what has happened to those in whom we hoped and to whom we fled for help to be delivered from the king of Assyria! And we, how shall we escape?'"
At the same time he hoped that money would be given him by Paul. So he sent for him often and conversed with him.
